name: Stories of the Outnumbered
description:
Hello, I'd like to introduce you to my game, Stories of the Outnumbered!

Stories of the Outnumbered is an experimental Real-Time Strategy Game, still in development, that implements features like:

Battles and armies

A map

Pixel graphics that render at up to 1080p

---

System requirements:

Windows 7 or higher

Core i3

4GB RAM or higher

200MB hard drive space
